name: UpdateDepartment
description:
Update details of an existing department in Freshservice.

Use this tool to change details of an existing department or company in Freshservice. Ideal for modifying department attributes such as name or other relevant information.

parameters.name: department_id
parameters.description: ID of the department to update. Required for identifying which department's information to modify.

value_schema.description: ID of department to retrieve

parameters.name: department_unique_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the department to update.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the department

parameters.name: department_name
parameters.description: The new name of the department to be updated.

value_schema.description: Name of the department

parameters.name: department_description
parameters.description: Provide a description about the department. This is used to update the existing details of the department in Freshservice.

value_schema.description: Description about the department

parameters.name: head_user_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the agent or requester serving as the department head.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the agent or requester who serves as the head of the department

parameters.name: prime_user_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the agent or requester who serves as the prime user of the department.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the agent or requester who serves as the prime user of the department

parameters.name: email_domains
parameters.description: List of email domains linked to the department, like ['example.com'].

value_schema.description: Email domains associated with the department

parameters.name: custom_fields
parameters.description: JSON object containing custom fields related to a Freshservice entity. Include key-value pairs for each field.

value_schema.description: Custom fields that are associated with a Freshservice entity

parameters.name: department_creation_timestamp
parameters.description: The timestamp indicating when the department was originally created in Freshservice. This should be formatted as a string.

value_schema.description: Timestamp at which the department was created

parameters.name: last_modified_timestamp
parameters.description: Timestamp indicating when the department was last modified. Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ.

value_schema.description: Timestamp at which the department was last modified

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.
